title: What subjects in 3rd sem cs generally have relative grading

comments.body: Look it depends we a year back had relative in ddco and DSA, no clue why they had relative in DSA, but yeah did don't expect any relative in sds, automata webtech
you didn't have relative grading for webtech? I heard the opposite.
Are you insane or was your batch full of webtech nerds. I would've gotten a D if  it weren't for relative. Got b
WT was most definitely relatively graded , only saving grace tbh.
